price: ឬក៏ទ្រង់នឹងដាក់ទណ្ឌកម្មពួកគេក្នុងពេលធ្វើដំណើរចុះឡើង (រកស៊ី)របស់ពួកគេ? ហេតុនេះពួកគេមិនអាចគេចផុតបានឡើយ។
arabic: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ فِي تَقَلُّبِهِمۡ فَمَا هُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: aw yakhudhahum fī taqallubihim famā hum bimuʿ'jizīna
